rules_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any type.
{3}{P}{P}: Choose a card name. Impossibility Reactor gains “Your opponents can’t cast spells with the chosen name.” until the next time you activate this ability. Activate only as a sorcery.
notes:
Inspiration — Forbidden technology, tehcnology from ancient society, [natural object] is a machine

Mechanical Uniqueness — Purple mana

Assistance — Adding mana of any type
